text: @realDonaldTrump The USA does not need Trump's kind of greatness: over 2 million coronavirus cases with more than 113,267 deaths, massive unemployment, a stock market crash, widespread civil unrest, you name it. Just as we judge a tree by its fruit, we must judge Trump by his results.
